result.markdown: --- title: "Research Talk Chaire EcoConception" description: | A short description of the post. author: - name: Rodney Dyer url: https://dyerlab.org affiliation: Center for Environmental Studies affiliation_url: https://ces.vcu.edu orcid_id: 0000-0003-4707-3453 date: 2015-09-22 output: distill::distill_article: self_contained: false --- I've been asked to provide a talk for a meeting in Paris at the [Institut des Sciences et Technologies](http://www.paristech.fr/), about how we use network theory to uncover connectivity networks in urban pollination systems.
